title: "Visa’s Artificial Intelligence Prevents Nearly $88 Million In Fraud From Impacting"
excerpt: "Visa, the world’s leader in digital payments, has today announced its artificial intelligence (AI) solution Visa Advanced Authorisation has helped financial institutions to prevent nearly $88 million in fraud from impacting New Zealand businesses in the past year."
